item.title: The tech-heavy 'QQQ' is near a new record. Here are the stocks that analysts see taking it over the top
item.description: While a small group of stocks have largely boosted the QQQ this year, analysts predict a more varied slate of winners going forward.

item.title: Josh Brown says AI story and US consumer are the only two things that matter to the markets
item.description: "The consumer is fine and the 'Mag 7' AI theme is intact. ... That would be enough to understand why we're on the verge of a new record high," Brown s...

item.title: How to trade the S&P 500's march to record highs using options as volatility remains elevated
item.description: Equity bears are growling, and bulls are sharpening their horns.

item.title: Investor Steve Eisman says we are headed for a global recession if Trump's tariffs spark a trade war
item.description: The former Neuberger Berman senior portfolio manager said it's extremely hard to predict how these high-stakes trade negotiations would unfold.

item.title: Truist says this internet retailer's revenue is tracking above expectations so investors should buy the dip
item.description: Truist Securities pointed to rising revenue and monthly active users as catalysts that could boost Etsy shares 11% higher.
